Hey <@UHNG8CJ82>! You might be interested in the <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> ! Allows you to use whatever text editor/plugins you want :smile_cat:

Check it out here <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CLJJXGTC0/p1563457134002700>
All over this my man, I just work on a few different portals at a time so it get's pretty hectic out there :stuck_out_tongue:
